QuestData.Title: Where Rivers Sleep
QuestData.Description:
The Mirewood contains key reagents often used to converse with the ancestors. Unfortunately, the Mudfin tribe swarms the area, making it difficult for us to forage the area.
If you could gather some of the blooms within the marsh, along with some of the Mudfin's own resources, I would appreciate it.
QuestData.RewardText: I thank you. These will be put to good use.
